title: Microsoft Patch Tuesday, July 2025 Edition
summary: Microsoft today released updates to fix at least 137 security vulnerabilities in its Windows operating systems and supported software. title: Samsung announces major security enhancements coming to One UI 8
summary: Samsung has announced multiple data security and privacy enhancements for its upcoming Galaxy smartphones running One UI 8, its custom user interface on top of Android. [...]

title: M&S confirms social engineering led to massive ransomware attack
summary: M&S confirmed today that the retail outlet's network was initially breached in a "sophisticated impersonation attack" that ultimately led to a DragonForce ransomware attack. [...]
